Plot: An ex-CIA agent and his estranged daughter are forced on the run when his employers erase all records of his existence, and mark them both for termination as part of a wide-reaching international conspiracy.
Title: Erased
Actors: Aaron Eckhart, Liana Liberato, Olga Kurylenko, Garrick Hagon
tomatoConsensus: Derivative to a fault, Erased squanders some nifty potential and its talented cast in a bland retelling of a story action fans have seen too many times before.
